speaker: President. −
english: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0181/2008 ) by Mr Lewandowski, on behalf of the Committee on Budgets, on Parliament's estimates of revenue and expenditure for the financial year 2009 ( 2008/2022(BUD) ).
original: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0181/2008 ) by Mr Lewandowski, on behalf of the Committee on Budgets, on Parliament's estimates of revenue and expenditure for the financial year 2009 ( 2008/2022(BUD) ).
